snippet.title: Rocket of Whispers: Prologue - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Rocket of Whispers: Prologue is a short narrative game with a very short playtime. It takes place before the main game, OPUS: Rocket of Whispers, and tells the story of Fei Lin’s first waking moments.

👇Visit the store pages of the main game OPUS: Rocket of Whispers here : 
Android https://goo.gl/yndeDJ
iOS https://goo.gl/toQJ71
Steam https://goo.gl/fszXv2

When I awoke, I was all alone.
The familiar scenery around me, were in ruins.

In a chilling cellar below the apocalyptic snow, Fei Lin the witch wakes up from hibernation, and ventures into the forsaken world. Guide her through the process of escaping the cellar, and seeing the changed world for her first time.

“Fei... Have you awakened?”
“If you awaken to a world in ruin, please... return us...” - Church Elder

With an important mission and the hopes of the people resting on her shoulders, Fei Lin takes her first steps into a lonely, empty world that has been forgotten by time itself.
